definition: to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious

sentences.english: In contrast with developed islands, this paper also analyzed the problems exposed in earlier exploitation.
sentences.chinese: 對比已開發無人島現狀，分析開發中凸顯的問題。

sentences.english: Butterfly shapes accentuate the sweetness of heart-shaped faces.
sentences.chinese: 蝶形的太陽鏡會凸顯處心形臉的甜美。

sentences.english: Completing the war motif, sandbags surround the outdoor seating area.
sentences.chinese: 爲了凸顯戰爭主題，店外客座區周圍都堆滿了沙袋。

sentences.english: City’s recent purchase of Nasri really bumps them up here.
sentences.chinese: 曼城隊最近購入的納斯里凸顯了他們在這方面的渴求。

sentences.english: The old apse gave an important illusion of depth which has now been restored.
sentences.chinese: 原來那個凸顯進深的後殿如今得到了修復。

sentences.english: With the opening of the bridge, the value of great natural environment in Dinghai becomes increasingly important.
sentences.chinese: 隨着跨海大橋的開通，定海自然環境的價值日益凸顯。

sentences.english: That highlights the danger in Mr Bernanke's new strategy.
sentences.chinese: 這一點凸顯了伯南克新招中的一種危險。

sentences.english: I believe as time moves on, the legacy of Zhu Rongji will become more obvious.
sentences.chinese: 相信隨着時局推移，朱熔基的價值和意義會更加凸顯。

sentences.english: That pace has just gotten even slower, highlighting the difficulty the two countries continue to face in putting a nasty past behind them.
sentences.chinese: 進展如今甚至更加緩慢，凸顯兩國捐棄前嫌的困難。

sentences.english: I love how the lighting shows the beams . Really smart idea.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡這種用燈光凸顯樑柱的方式，非常明智。

sentences.english: The new curriculum reform calls for experience -based curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 新一輪的課程改革凸顯課程經驗化的問題。

sentences.english: Now on the market of Lingbi rockery highlights the slightly higher prices of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 現在市場上靈璧假山石凸顯出價格稍高的形勢。

sentences.english: After the redecoration, it focuses more on the "customers-centered" concept .
sentences.chinese: 經全新改版後更凸顯出“以人爲本”的服務理念。

sentences.english: But this is where you can see the difference between winners and losers.
sentences.chinese: 但就裏，者和失敗者的不同點就凸顯了。

sentences.english: The environment highlights how China is caught in a Catch-22 .
sentences.chinese: 環境問題凸顯出中國怎樣陷入了左右爲難的境地。

sentences.english: It also highlights the severity of the pollution along the coastal manufacturing belt.
sentences.chinese: 這還凸顯了沿海製造業帶污染的嚴重性。

definition: conspicuous/to make sth stand out/make sth prominent
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
